audio-toggle-button.heading: Audio
audio-toggle-button.message: You won't hear any of the sound thingies on this page until you turn the audio on!

pocket-toggle-button-closed.heading: Pocket
pocket-toggle-button-closed.message: Open your pocket to store and retrieve thingies from the current page, as well as add new thingies from your device.

pocket-toggle-button-open.heading: Pocket
pocket-toggle-button-open.message:
Hold D while clicking and holding to drag a thingie out of the pocket onto a page.

You can also take a thingie off of a page to put it in your pocket. This way, you can save it for another time or take it to another page.

settings-toggle-button.heading: Settings
settings-toggle-button.message: This is where you can toggle your settings and preferences for the site (like showing/hiding these tooltips) as well as switch from Explore to Edit mode.

explore-mode-toggle.heading: Explore mode
explore-mode-toggle.message: Enabling explore mode allows you to move through the site without worrying about changing anything.

tooltip-mode-toggle.heading: Tooltips
tooltip-mode-toggle.message: Turn off this toggle to hide tooltips.

portals-mode-toggle.heading: Portals
portals-mode-toggle.message: A portal is a passageway to another page, click on one to see where it takes you! If you don't want to see them, turn them off here.

token-input-toggle-button.heading: Add a token
token-input-toggle-button.message: Click here to submit a token. A token gives access to create within a Verse.

uploader-toggle-button.heading: Upload a file
uploader-toggle-button.message: Click to toggle the file uploader where you can add new image and sound thingies.

compost-portal-toggle-button.heading: Compost
compost-portal-toggle-button.message: If there is a thingie you want to discard from this page, throw it here in the compost, where someone else can grab it.

thingie.heading: Thingie
thingie.message: Double click on a thingie to edit it.

portal.heading: Portal
portal.message:
A portal is a passageway to another page, click on one to see where it takes you!

To make a new portal, a shift + click anywhere on the page will let you enter the name of an existing page you want to connect to this one.

caddy-handle.heading: Caddy
caddy-handle.message: Click and drag this hand to grab and move your toolkit
